column1: #Text=Tenzin says : " Lin , um , I , I - I need to ask you a favor .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Will you stay here and watch over Pema and the children while I meet with the council ?
#Text=With everything that has happened lately , I want to be sure my family is in safe hands .
#Text=" Lin says : " Of course I 'll help , old friend .
#Text=" Pema says : " I did n't realize you two were out here .
#Text=Ye - yes - yes , Lin has agreed to help out around here and keep an eye on things while I 'm away .
#Text=I could use the extra pair of hands .
#Text=Would you mind giving him a bath ?
#Text=" Lin says : " This is not what I signed on for !
#Text=" Meelo says : " I got ta poo !
#Text=" Councilwoman says : " Do you know where my keys are ?
#Text=" Councilwoman says : " Do n't wait up for me ; this council session will probably go late into the night .
#Text=" Lieutenant says : " We 're here to fix a spider - rat problem .
#Text=" Councilwoman says : " I did n't call an exterminator .
